A dark grey shade,rio iron can be added to finish a modern grey-toned look, or in a bedroom/office. With the right accessories this blind adds a polished finished look to your room. Product id: db-nfpl0040 fabric colour: iron material: 100% polyester lining: reflective blackout silver backing - uv blocking headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.
